abstract: Waldir Maranhao, speaker of Brazil's lower house of Congress, abruptly revokes his stated intention to annul impeachment proceedings against Pres Dilma Rousseff; about-face, coming after criticism from Maranhao's Progressive Party, increases chances Rousseff will be impeached.
lead_paragraph: The sudden twist by the speaker of the lower house comes as the upper house is scheduled to start voting on whether to remove her from office.

headline.main: Brazilian Speaker, in About-Face, Won’t Annul Dilma Rousseff’s Impeachment
headline.print_headline: Brazil’s Speaker, in About-Face, Won’t Annul President’s Impeachment

snippet: The sudden twist by the speaker of the lower house comes as the upper house is scheduled to start voting on whether to remove her from office.
